import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const PSA5 = () => { const [comments, setComments] = useState([]); const [userPhotoBase64, setUserPhoto] = useState(localStorage.getItem('userPhotoBase64') || null); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(localStorage.getItem('userName') || 'Your Name'); useEffect(() => { // Load comments from local storage specific to this page const storedComments = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('commentsPSA5')) || []; setComments(storedComments); }, []); // This effect runs only once when the component mounts const handleFormSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const comment = event.target.elements.comment.value; const newComment = { author: userName, timestamp: new Date().toLocaleString(), content: comment, photo: userPhotoBase64, }; const updatedComments = [...comments, newComment]; setComments(updatedComments); event.target.reset(); // Save comments to local storage specific to this page localStorage.setItem('commentsPSA5', JSON.stringify(updatedComments)); }; return (

Mushishi Zoku Shou 2nd Season

フルメタルアルケミスト: ブラザーフッド

"Mushishi Zoku Shou 2nd Season" is an anime series that serves as a continuation of the original "Mushishi" anime. Set in a mystical world filled with enigmatic creatures known as "mushi," the series follows the journey of Ginko, a traveling mushishi (a person who studies and deals with mushi) as he encounters various phenomena and helps people affected by the supernatural beings In the second season, Ginko continues his exploration of the natural and supernatural world, seeking to understand and unravel the secrets of the mushi. Each episode presents a standalone story, showcasing Ginko's encounters with different individuals who are entwined with the mysterious mushi. As he delves deeper into their lives and the mystical occurrences surrounding them, Ginko offers his wisdom and expertise to aid those who find themselves caught in the intricate web of the mushi's influence.
